industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage and Warehousing and Storage
description:
Job Category: Full Time - DIRECT HIRE EMPLOYMENT, Onsite position

Compensation: $75,000 - $85,000/Year


Are you ready to take the reins of a dynamic procurement operation that drives success in a leading company? We are seeking a detail-oriented and strategic Procurement Manager who is passionate about optimizing supply chain processes and building strong supplier relationships. With a focus on marble, stone, and tile products, this role offers the opportunity to make a significant impact while working in a collaborative environment.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Purchase Orders: Manage the entire process, ensuring accuracy and adherence to standards.
  • Monitor and ensure timely delivery, addressing any issues swiftly.
  • Oversee logistics, coordinate with warehouse teams, and maintain inventory organization.
  • Build strong supplier relationships, negotiate pricing, and secure favorable terms.
  • Problem Resolution & Reporting: Tackle challenges head-on, maintain detailed records, and report on key procurement metrics.


Qualifications/Experience:

  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in procurement, purchasing or supply chain management
  • Experience in marble, stone, and tile products preferred or carpentry, furniture or light fixture sales
  • Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Supply Chain Management, or a related field a plus
  • QuickBooks software experience a plus
  • Certifications like CPP or CPSM are a plus.
  • Skills: Strong negotiation, communication, and organizational skills, with proficiency in procurement software and Microsoft Office.


Why You Should Apply:

  • Health Insurance, Vacation, Holiday Pay, Sick Pay
  • Flexible Schedule
  • Weekly Luncheons
  • Generous Bonus Potential: Earn an additional $25,000 annually, plus a monthly percentage of company sales.
  • Growth-Oriented Role: Contribute to a high-performing team and align procurement activities with our strategic goals.
